actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend Title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the separate definition of disability presently applicable to widows and widowers.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the separate definition of disability applicable to widows, surviving divorced wives, widowers, and surviving divorced husbands.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the separate definition of disability presently applicable to widows and widowers.
